name: ft_split
description:
Grab whoever is sitting next to you and force them to fight you in an epic battle of skills (and sometimes luck)!

Each player controls a tank that can move, shoot and dash. Your only goal is to eliminate the other player. Five times. Be the first to reach five wins and triumph!

One last thing: every round, both players get to choose a bonus or a malus to apply to the next round. What's more, modifiers carry over throughout the rounds...

Controls:

Player one: WASD move, J accept, K cancel

Player two: ARROWS move, numpad 1 accept, numpad 2 cancel
